column5: Today... all day... thanks to Extreme Angler TV  we will be giving away autographed copies of thier 2007 Extreme Angler   Annual. (plus an Extreme Goodie Bag!!!)  The GIANT - once per year- 2007 Extreme Angler   Annual is now released and the many fishing folks who sent in the advanced order   forms get a Extreme Angler TV  T-shirt as well (in the mail as you   read this);  Best of all...100% CANADIAN.  Jam packed with multi-specie How`s, Whens, With-   whats and where`s...at authorized retail tackle outlets and news stands across   Canada and the USA in 2-10 days. Enjoy. http://www.extremeanglertv.com   P.S...The Muskie Painting Contest is coming close   to an end... get your free entries in before it ends!!  Who will be the lucky winner?  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=848
Awesome TJ!  So are you going to be posting questions as in the past??
How do I win one of these
I am sure that I will be!
Ya... ill be posting 12 questions throughout the day...  first one coming soon!!
TJ I have never seen this magazine before can it be bought on news stands?

According to their website it can be purchased at newsstands.  However I have looked everywhere since Feb trying to find it.  Have had no luck so far.  Even the mega chapters downtown did not have it.  Ah now I see TJ's thread, seems that OFC is more up to date then their own website.  2 - 10 days I will check again on the weekend.
